gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 133, Clippers 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Clippers, 133-116. Pascal Siakam led the Pacers with 31 points, four rebounds, and two assists, while Myles Turner (24 points, seven rebounds) and Tyrese Haliburton (21 points, nine assists) combined for 45 points in the victory. Paul George tallied 26 points, three assists, and two steals for the Clippers in the defeat. The Pacers improve to 41-32, while the Clippers fall to 44-27.
